block.p: Dr. Lucia Buttaro and Kevin William O'Donohue were married yesterday by the Rev. Thomas Quinlan at St. Patrick's Cathedral in New York.

Dr. Buttaro-O'Donohue, 36, is an assistant professor of speech and communications at Kingsborough Community College in New York. She graduated from the Daguerre Institute of Higher Learning in Buenos Aires and received a doctorate in philosophy from Fordham University. She is a daughter of Maria Cristina Buttaro and Giuseppe Buttaro of New York.
Dr. Lucia Buttaro and Kevin William O'Donohue were married yesterday by the Rev. Thomas Quinlan at St. Patrick's Cathedral in New York.

Dr. Buttaro-O'Donohue, 36, is an assistant professor of speech and communications at Kingsborough Community College in New York. She graduated from the Daguerre Institute of Higher Learning in Buenos Aires and received a doctorate in philosophy from Fordham University. She is a daughter of Maria Cristina Buttaro and Giuseppe Buttaro of New York.

Mr. O'Donohue, 42, is the chief executive of B. B. P. Network Consulting, a computer network consulting firm in Voorhees, N.J. He graduated from Temple University and received an M.B.A. degree from Rutgers. He is the son of Frances and Thomas J. O'Donohue of Poquoson, Va.
